hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #gold#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Fire Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Coffin Recovery Heart 2

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Recovery Heart

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that King Dodongo dislikes smoke.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Level Island Courtyard

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Jail Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Recovery Heart 2

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Moving Fire Room Recovery Heart 1

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: This is a haiku&Five syllables then seven&Five more to finish

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.
hinted_locations: Hideout Break Room Hall to Balcony Wonderitem

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: ${12 68 79}They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Push Block Room
